snippet.title: 003 BLUE STINGER - Campy, fun survival horror | DREAMVERSE
snippet.description:
This is a video about a couple of things, but mostly Blue Stinger for the Dreamcast.

In this ridiculous action/horror survival game, everything feels a little bit off - in a good way. It also feels a bit frustrating - in a bad way.

'Dreamverse' is about a chronologically talking, in a semi-deep voice, about every European and North American released game for SEGAs last console.

Apologies for sometimes butchering the Japanese language (and other languages).

Music by Oculus_Official:
"Evening"
https://youtu.be/f_G657-MW1s
"Chill Out" & "Lux" from The Jungle beat tape
https://youtu.be/Kw5ZlXqzQVU

Be sure to read John Andersen's fantastic interview with Shinya Nishigaki, just a few months before he passed away:
https://www.gamasutra.com/blogs/JohnAndersen/20150213/236413/Remembering_Shinya_Nishigaki_and_his_quotCrazy_Gamesquot_Blue_Stinger_and_Illbleed.php

Batman 60s dance moves:
https://youtu.be/RsYA8Gr5NTY

Evil Dead 2 clip:
https://youtu.be/SOpcdJ_V5_M

Groovy clip:
https://youtu.be/ZhZYAL_7nMg
